Module dunbar.c482pa
Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

Class AddPartWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c482pa.Controllers.AddPartWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddPartWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The AddPartWindowController controls the interface used to add new parts to the Inventory. It implements the Initializable interface to automatically generate a valid part ID for the new part.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Generates a unique part ID based on other parts currently in inventory.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • changeWindowButton

      private void changeWindowButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String newAddress) throws IOException
      Loads the specified scene for a new window.
      Parameters:
      event - An action even for a button press in the GUI
      newAddress - The package address for the desired FXML file
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionInHouse

      void onActionInHouse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the label for the location text box. Sets the location label to Machine ID when the In House radio button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by selecting the In House radio button

    • onActionOutsourced

      void onActionOutsourced(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the label for the location text box. Sets the location label to Company Name when the Outsourced radio button is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by selecting the Outsourced radio button

    • onActionReturnToMain

      void onActionReturnToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Main window when the cancel button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveAndReturn

      void onActionSaveAndReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, NumberFormatException
      Saves the new part and returns to the main window when the Save button is pressed. Generates a new Part object based off of the values in the text fields and passes them to the relevant constructor, then adds the new part to the Inventory allParts list.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Save button
      Throws:
      IOException
      NumberFormatException
